newsitem.title: GERMANY: IP Network posts 4.7 pct turnover growth in 1996.
newsitem.headline: IP Network posts 4.7 pct turnover growth in 1996.

text.p: International advertising sales house IP Network posted six billion marks in turnover worldwide in 1996, a 4.7 percent increase on the previous year, its German unit said on Wednesday.

The German IP unit, IP Deutschland, said it had also seen growth, boosting its television advertisement bookings by 18 percent last year to 3.3 million spots. A spokeswoman for the company declined to give forecasts for the current year.

IP Deutschland's clients reported a total of 3.92 billion marks in gross advertising income last year, representing 36.4 percent of the German market, the company said. IP sells ads for private stations RTL, RTL2, Super RTL and TM3 in Germany.
IP Network is a unit of French communications group Havas.
